data.why:
DBIx::NamedDSN - a layer of abstraction for DSNs. Assists sites
    which are part of a hetrogenous network of DBDs where the databases
    may be in flux.

    Allows DBIx::NamedDSN->connect($canoncial_name) or
    DBIx::NamedDSN->connect($canonical_name,$user,$pass); returns a DBI
    handle connected to the predefined driver source.
